channel.title: CVE Feed for cyberlord92 -- Web3 – Crypto wallet Login & NFT token gating
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cyberlord92 -- Web3 – Crypto wallet Login & NFT token gating

item.title: CVE-2023-3249|2024-08-02T06:48:08.498Z -- cyberlord92 -- web3%20%E2%80%93%20crypto%20wallet%20login%20%26%20nft%20token%20gating
item.description: The Web3 – Crypto wallet Login & NFT token gating plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.6.0. This is due to incorrect authentication checking in the 'hidden_form_data' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the username.
